string-array.name: vpn_states_ext_mtpd_exit
string-array.item: Disconnected by server, please check the username and password
Failed to get the server address
Failed to connect to the server (VPN service not supported by server)

string-array.item: Must be root to run PPP
Server refused to authenticate: link terminated
Connection terminated due to lack of activity.
Authentication failed: please check username and password
